title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body:
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

I've tried everything, going on reddit, youtube, Lol site and nothings worked. I've even reinstalled a couple of times, tried different accounts etc.

I'm on mac, osx el capitan

Please help

replies.body:
PvP.net connection errors are usually instigated by network settings that prevent a good connection from being established to the service. Not to worry, we've consolidated the most frequent fixes in our [Mac Connection Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac)

Let me know if those steps resolved this or not.
ive tried everything on the page but nothing worked

In that case, we'll need to dive into some system logs in order to investigate further. I strongly suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you run a set of logs using our [HRT Application](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite the troubleshooting process.

Let me know if you have any questions.
